name: Beasty Ball Mania - A 3D Physics Based Endless Runner / Platformer Marble Rolling Dash
name_original: Beasty Ball Mania - A 3D Physics Based Endless Runner / Platformer Marble Rolling Dash
description:
Looking for a new twist in an Endless Runner? Beasty Ball Mania is your game! A physics based endless runner / platform game that's sure to challenge.

Play as one of the Beasty Balls as you roll, jump and spin your way across beautiful, minimalistic 3D environments. Swipe and Tap your way over and thru challenging obstacles in this fast and frenzied endless running game for iPad, iPad mini, iPhone & iPod touch.

Do you have the skills to master the Beasty Ball Mania?

AMAZING ABILITIES
Utilize your Beasty Ball’s powers to dodge hazards, jump over barriers and leap from platform to platform. Plus crush and move obstacles using your Beasty Ball’s spin strength!

STUNNING GRAPHICS
The beautifully minimalistic 3D worlds come to life on mobile and tablet!

MULTIPLE CHARACTERS
Choose to play as one of the Beasty Balls: Leopard, Tiger, Zebra, and Giraffe. Each Beasty Ball unlocks special powers and abilities.

EPIC ROLLER
Use all of the Beasty Ball’s agility and abilities to survive the mania! But BEWARE, if you do not keep moving the game will swallow you up.

POWERUPS
Unlock, win or buy ingenious power-ups to help you roll further. Including head starts, power jumps, ring magnets and unique score boosters!

…ROLL, ROLL, ROLL!
Get more rewards the more you play! Level up your score multiplier by completing unique objectives, or win amazing prizes including the valuable Pearls.
